com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers

Class BlockData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers.BlockDataRegistry
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers.BlockData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockDataImpl

    public abstract class BlockData
extends BlockDataRegistry
    Stores a reference to net.minecraft.server.Block and IBlockData objects, providing access to Block and Block Data properties.

    • Field Summary

      • getDefaultRenderOptions

        public final BlockRenderOptions getDefaultRenderOptions()
        Gets a mapping of key:value pairs for all the default data-encoded render options set for this BlockData. For example, stairs will add the facing: west key-value pair. The returned options are as if the Block is free-standing in an empty void of Air.
        Returns:
        default render options

      • getRenderOptions

        public final BlockRenderOptions getRenderOptions(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
        Gets a mapping of key:value pairs for all the data-encoded render options set for this BlockData. For example, stairs will add the facing: west key-value pair. The returned object can be safely changed (mutable).
        Parameters:
        block -
        Returns:
        data options (mutable)

      • getRenderOptions

        public abstract BlockRenderOptions getRenderOptions(org.bukkit.World world,
                                                    int x,
                                                    int y,
                                                    int z)
        Gets a mapping of key:value pairs for all the data-encoded render options set for this BlockData. For example, stairs will add the facing: west key-value pair. The returned object can be safely changed (mutable).
        Parameters:
        world - the block is at
        x - - coordinate of the block
        y - - coordinate of the block
        z - - coordinate of the block
        Returns:
        data options (mutable)

      • getMaterialData

        public abstract org.bukkit.material.MaterialData getMaterialData()
        Gets the MaterialData information for this Block. This Object is not mutable and should not be changed! Read-only access only.
        Returns:
        material data (immutable)

      • getFacingDirection

        public org.bukkit.block.BlockFace getFacingDirection()
        Gets the facing direction for this Block Data. If this Block is directional, the result of Directional.getFacing() is returned. If it is not, by default BlockFace.NORTH is returned.
        Returns:
        facing direction

      • newMaterialData

        public final <T extends org.bukkit.material.MaterialData> T newMaterialData(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Creates a new MaterialData instance appropriate for this Block, and attempts to cast it to a particular Material type. If casting fails, null is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        type - of Material Data
        Returns:
        Block Material Data, or null on failure

      • getOpacity

        public abstract int getOpacity()
        Gets the opacity of the Block, a value between 0 and 15. A value of 255 indicates full opaque-ness. A value of 0 is fully transparent.
        Returns:
        the opacity

      • getEmission

        public abstract int getEmission()
        Gets the amount of light the Block radiates, value between 0 and 15.
        Returns:
        light emission

      • isOccluding

        public abstract boolean isOccluding()
        Gets whether this Block is fully occluding, not allowing light to pass through
        Returns:
        True if fully occluding, False if not

      • isSuffocating

        public abstract boolean isSuffocating()
        Gets whether this Block causes suffocation damage to players inside
        Returns:
        True if suffocation occurs, False if not

      • isPowerSource

        public abstract boolean isPowerSource()
        Gets whether this Block is a source of Redstone Power
        Returns:
        True if the block is a power source, False if not
